abstract: You’ll soon be able to make unlimited phone calls on your iPhone — without using up any of your monthly airtime minutes.
snippet: You’ll soon be able to make unlimited phone calls on your iPhone — without using up any of your monthly airtime minutes.
lead_paragraph: What a shocker: "AT&T today announced it has taken the steps necessary so that Apple can enable VoIP applications on iPhone to run on AT&T's wireless network. Previously, VoIP applications on iPhone were enabled for Wi-Fi connectivity."

headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
